item.title: 3D Bust
item.description: I used 123D Catch, blender, and THREE.js to create and render a 3D bust of yours truly.

item.title: The CNC Project
item.description: The CNC project began in the summer of 2012 when I bought a ShapeOko 1 kit to explore the field. It then turned into an IDEA Grant project, and a senior design project too.

item.title: WendellWallach.com
item.description: Wendell and I met through TEDxUConn, after which he asked me to build and maintain a personal site for him.

item.title: README
item.description:
README

npm install –global gulp

npm install –save-dev gulp

npm install gulp-sass –save-dev

npm install gulp-sourcemaps –save-dev

npm install –save-dev gulp-autoprefixer

npm install browser-sync gulp –save-dev

npm install –save-dev gulp-shell

item.title: about
item.description:
About Me

I am a web developer and student currently finishing a Computer Science Engineering degree at the University of Connecticut. I am obsessed with learning, craftsmanship, and lists of three items.

I like to make cool things - you can see some of my work on the projects page, and on my GitHub.

Say hi via Twitter or Google+, I’d love to hear from you!

About this site

This is a static site hosted on Github Pages, and generated by Hugo. I have a pretty awesome frontend dev setup using Gulp that you can read about… when I make the blog post.

I use TypePlate as the site’s typographic foundation and wrote the rest of the styles myself in SASS.

item.title: Short
item.description: The font-size of the header element has a baffling effect on the scrollable page height in Firefox only…
